name: google-researcher-mcp
description: MCP server providing Google Search, web scraping, and multi-source research tools for AI assistants
long_description:
A comprehensive MCP server that enables AI assistants to search the web, scrape content, and conduct multi-source research.

**Features:**
- Google Custom Search with advanced filtering (time range, site, language)
- Web page scraping with JavaScript rendering via Playwright
- YouTube transcript extraction with language support
- Document parsing (PDF, DOCX, PPTX) with text extraction
- Academic paper search across arXiv, PubMed, IEEE, Nature, Springer
- Patent search via Google Patents with prior art analysis
- Multi-step research tracking for complex investigations
- Smart caching (30min search, 1hr content) and rate limiting
- Content deduplication and quality scoring

google_api_key.title: Google API Key
google_api_key.description: Your Google Cloud API key with Custom Search JSON API enabled. Get one at console.cloud.google.com/apis/credentials

google_search_id.title: Search Engine ID
google_search_id.description: Your Programmable Search Engine ID. Create one at programmablesearchengine.google.com (enable 'Search the entire web')

tools.name: google_search
tools.description: Search the web using Google Custom Search API. Returns URLs with titles and snippets. Supports time range, site filtering, and language options.

tools.name: scrape_page
tools.description: Extract text content from a URL. Handles web pages (static + JavaScript), YouTube videos (transcripts), and documents (PDF, DOCX, PPTX). Supports preview mode and content size limits.

tools.name: search_and_scrape
tools.description: Search Google AND retrieve content from top results in one call. Returns combined, deduplicated content with source attribution. Most efficient for research tasks.

tools.name: google_image_search
tools.description: Search for images using Google Custom Search API. Returns image URLs, thumbnails, dimensions. Filter by size, type, color, and format.

tools.name: google_news_search
tools.description: Search for recent news articles. Filter by freshness (hour/day/week/month/year), sort by relevance or date, restrict to specific news sources.

tools.name: academic_search
tools.description: Search academic papers with pre-formatted citations. Sources: arXiv, PubMed, IEEE, Nature, Springer. Filter by year range and source.

tools.name: patent_search
tools.description: Search patents via Google Patents. Supports prior art search, assignee/inventor filtering, patent office selection (USPTO, EPO, WIPO, JPO, CNIPA, KIPO).

tools.name: sequential_search
tools.description: Track multi-step research progress across API calls. Supports branching, revision tracking, and session persistence for complex investigations.
